title: The Right Play
description:
Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth and Spencer Hall debate the significance of the Nets giving Kyrie permission to seek a sign-and-trade before talking their thoughts on Deshaun Watson potentially getting a year-long suspension.

itunes:subtitle: (debatable): Kyrie Asks To Seek Sign-And-Trade, Potential Suspension Length For Watson
